amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate funding for the Iraq Train and Equip program and apply the savings of $715 million to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce all funds for the Iraq Train and Equip program, and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nolan amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 56 - 375 (Roll no. 342).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nolan amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 56 - 375 (Roll no. 342).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Nolan.
